layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x48
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x48
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x16
      RenderBlock {BLOCKQUOTE} at (40,0) size 704x16
        RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 704x16
          RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 704x16
            RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 704x16 [color=#008000]
              RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 166x16
                text run at (0,0) width 166: "This text should be green."
